name: Remove Engine UI App
title: Remove Engine UI App
tag_line: Strip the active car's engine with one tap.
description: Dashboard UI app that swaps the active vehicle's engine slot to Empty in a single click.
author: Khodar
message:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B]Pull the engine without opening the parts configurator.[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[FONT=Verdana][SIZE=4]Remove Engine adds a focused UI tile that inspects the active vehicle, shows you which engine slot is installed, and removes it by installing BeamNG's built-in Empty state.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[CENTER][U]Highlights[/U][/CENTER]
[LIST]
[*]One-tap button to install the Empty part on the current car's engine slot
[*]Works with Automation cars and modded vehicles because it relies on user-empty states
[/LIST]

[FONT=Verdana]Perfect for recovery/towing scenarios, cinematic shoots, soapbox or downhill challenge runs, and any scenario where you need to disable drivetrains instantly.[/FONT]
